name: Final Fantasy XI: Chains of Promathia
synopsis: FINAL FANTASY XI, the award-winning online adventure RPG, continues with this new expansion pack. Join an ever growing population of adventurers from around the globe on this epic, cross-platform journey.  Discover the ancient legend of Promathia, God of Twilight. Bound in chains, he hold the key to the origins of Vana'diel.
